meanings.definition: To make a soft, low, continuous sound like that of a cat.
meanings.sent1: The kitten will nurr when it feels safe and content.
meanings.sent2: I heard the cat nurr softly as it curled up for a nap.
meanings.sent3: The little girl giggled as she tried to nurr like a cat.
meanings.sent4: The gentle breeze seemed to nurr through the trees in the peaceful forest.
meanings.sent5: The soothing sound of the river nurring put me to sleep.

meanings.definition: A soft, low, continuous sound like that of a cat.
meanings.sent1: The nurr of the cat was comforting on the quiet night.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the gentle nurr of the kitten from across the room.
meanings.sent3: The mysterious nurr in the dark alley made me curious.
meanings.sent4: The nurr of the distant train reminded me of home.
meanings.sent5: The calming nurr of the purring cat helped me relax after a long day.
